== Get started ==
=== Develop! ===
Are you a developer? Do you want to help Power Users by creating awesome tools to make Ubuntu rock on their machine? Just head to the <nowiki>[[PowerUsers-PowerUserTool|Power User Tool]]</nowiki> page where you will find all the informations.

=== Ship It! ===
Let's take the good stuff and get it shipped to users:

* <nowiki>[[PowerUsers-Quicklists|Quicklists]]</nowiki> - get user made quicklist .desktop files upstream
